body_html: Thanks @vrv. The PR has been updated with noise function moved to nn_ops.py so that it could be used by layers. The except has also been restricted to TypeError and ValueError (in eager mode). Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.
body_text: Thanks @vrv. The PR has been updated with noise function moved to nn_ops.py so that it could be used by layers. The except has also been restricted to TypeError and ValueError (in eager mode). Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.
body: Thanks @vrv. The PR has been updated with noise function moved to `nn_ops.py` so that it could be used by layers. The except has also been restricted to `TypeError` and `ValueError` (in eager mode). Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.
